description: This file defines data models, seed data, and analytical functions for an animal behavior analytics platform, including classes for animals, behaviors, behavior events, reports, and various analysis results. It also includes in-memory data storage and functions for computing summaries, baseline comparisons, and diversity indices related to animal behavior sessions.

classes.name: BehaviorEvent
classes.description: An annotated behavior occurrence in a session timeline.

classes.name: BaselineComparison
classes.description: Comparison metrics between a target session and a baseline session.

classes.name: DiversityIndexResult
classes.description: Shannon-like diversity index computed over behavior frequencies or time share.

methods.name: _seed_data
methods.description: Seeds in-memory data for animals, behaviors, sessions, events, and reports.

methods.name: _events_for_sessions
methods.description: Filters events for specified session IDs.

methods.name: _bin_key_minute
methods.description: Converts a timestamp to a minute-based ISO string for binning.

methods.name: compute_summary
methods.description: Computes session summaries including counts, durations, trendlines, and heatmaps.

methods.name: compute_baseline_comparison
methods.description: Calculates percentage deltas and flags for session vs baseline comparison.

methods.name: compute_diversity_index
methods.description: Calculates Shannon-like diversity index for a session.
